newsitem.title: TANZANIA: Christopher leaves Tanzania for South Africa.
newsitem.headline: Christopher leaves Tanzania for South Africa.

text.p: U.S. Secretary of State Warren Christopher left Tanzania on Friday for Cape Town, South Africa, the fourth leg of his first visit to sub-Saharan Africa, officials said.
They said Christopher, who arrived in the northern Tanzanian town of Arusha earlier on Friday and held talks with East African leaders, would fly to Angola after his Cape Town trip.
